description.english: You arrived to your apartment Complex
description.german: Du bist in deinem Wohnkomplex angekommen
description.french: Vous êtes arrivé dans votre complexe d’appartements
description.russian: Вы прибыли в свой жилой комплекс
description.japanese: 自分の住むアパートに到着した
description.brazilian: Você chegou ao seu complexo de apartamentos
description.latam: Llegaste al complejo de apartamentos

description.english: You got trapped in the red dimension
description.german: Du bist in der roten Dimension gefangen worden
description.french: Vous êtes resté piégé dans la dimension rouge
description.russian: Вы оказались заперты в Красном измерении
description.japanese: 赤い次元に囚われた
description.brazilian: Você ficou preso na dimensão vermelha
description.latam: Quedaste atrapada en la dimensión roja

description.english: You unlocked the keypad in level 1
description.german: Du hast die Tastatur in Level 1 entsperrt
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé le clavier au niveau 1
description.russian: Вы разблокировали клавиатуру на уровне 1
description.japanese: レベル1でキーパッドのロックを解除した
description.brazilian: Você desbloqueou o teclado no nível 1
description.latam: Desbloqueaste el teclado de seguridad en el nivel 1

description.english: You unlocked the keypad of the red dimension in level 1
description.german: Du hast die Tastatur der roten Dimension in Level 1 entsperrt
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé le clavier de la dimension rouge au niveau 1
description.russian: Вы разблокировали клавиатуру Красного измерения на уровне 1
description.japanese: レベル1で赤の次元にあるキーパッドの封印を解いた
description.turkish: Seviye 1’de kırmızı boyutun tuş takımının kilidini açtın
description.brazilian: Você desbloqueou o teclado da dimensão vermelha no nível 1
description.latam: Desbloqueaste el teclado de seguridad de la dimensión roja en el nivel 1

description.english: The corrupted world
description.german: Die korrupte Welt
description.french: Le monde corrompu
description.russian: Искажённый мир
description.japanese: 堕落した世界
description.brazilian: O mundo corrompido
description.latam: El mundo corrupto rojo

description.english: You arrived at your apartment
description.german: Du bist in deiner Wohnung angekommen
description.french: Vous êtes arrivé dans votre appartement

description.japanese: アパートに帰ってきた

description.latam: Llegue a mi apartamento

description.english: What happen!?
description.german: Was ist passiert!?
description.french: Que s’est-il passé !?
description.russian: Что произошло!?
description.japanese: 何が起きた！？
description.brazilian: O que aconteceu!?
description.latam: ¿Qué ha pasado?

description.english: You unlocked the Valve in level 1
description.german: Du hast das Ventil in Level 1 entsperrt
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé la valve au niveau 1

description.brazilian: Você destrancou a válvula no nível 1

description.english: You found the neighbor in level 1

description.english: You defeat the majin and seal the red dimension

displayName.latam: FINAL 2: La Oscura Doncella de la Dimensión Roja

description.english: You become the red maiden and corrupted the world
description.german: Du wirst zur roten Magd und korrumpierst die Welt
description.french: Vous êtes devenue la demoiselle rouge et avez corrompu le monde
description.russian: Вы стали красной девой и осквернили мир
description.japanese: あなたは赤の乙女へと変貌し、世界は腐食された
description.turkish: Kırmızı hizmetçi oldun ve dünyayı yozlaştırdın
description.brazilian: Você se tornou a donzela vermelha e corrompeu o mundo
description.latam: Te convertiste en la doncella roja y corrompiste el mundo
